column5: I have been told by two individuals that porta potties are not allowed in boats in Ontario. Neither person could show me reference to the law but both say that it is being enforced. Does anyone have a link to where I can verify this? Thanks.
I know my porta pooty is legal. Its called a roll of toilet paper.

My experience on Lake St Clair on the Canadian side was that you could have a head on board the boat but it had to be a pump out. If the porta-potty is a portable unit you are probably are not ok. Good luck
